de.bpmnaftool.model.transformation
Class ModelPreparation

java.lang.Object
  de.bpmnaftool.model.transformation.ModelPreparation

public class ModelPreparation
extends java.lang.Object

Contains static methods to prepare a BPMN model for its transformation

Author:
Felix Härer

Prepares the given model for transformation

Parameters:
model - model to prepare

removeBlackBoxPools

Removes black box pools from a BPMN-Model

Parameters:
model - model to prepare

removeUndefinedConditions

public static void removeUndefinedConditions(BpmnModel model)
Replaces all empty conditions with a number and creates conditions for default flows.

Parameters:
model - model to prepare

resolveOverlappingGateways

public static BpmnModel resolveOverlappingGateways(BpmnModel sourceModel)
In case overlapping Gateways are found, this method tries to resolve them. It removes the Gateways and creates new ones which do not overlap; also, it reduces the number of Gateways.

Parameters:
sourceModel - Model where overlapping Gateways are to be resolved

checkGatewayClusterForExternalFlows

private static boolean checkGatewayClusterForExternalFlows(BpmnModel sourceModel,
                                                           java.util.ArrayList<SequenceFlow[]> pathList)
Checks if Gateways in the given path list have incoming or outgoing flows to other nodes than the Gateways in the given list. If this is the case, the Gateways can not be used resolved if the overlap.

Parameters:
sourceModel - BpmnModel where paths are checked
pathList - List of Paths with Gateways to check
Returns:
true if no external incoming/outgoing flows, false otherwise

resolveOverlappingGateway

static boolean resolveOverlappingGateway(BpmnModel sourceModel,
                                         Gateway splitGateway)
In case overlapping Gateways are found, this method tries to resolve one Gateway. It removes all overlapping Gateway and creates new ones which do not overlap; also, it reduces the number of Gateways.

Parameters:
sourceModel - Model where overlapping Gateway are to be resolved
splitGateway - Gateway to resolve
Returns:
True if Gateway Overlap has been resolved, false otherwise

createNonOverlappingGateways

private static void createNonOverlappingGateways(BpmnModel sourceModel,
                                                 Gateway splitGateway,
                                                 Gateway cluster2LastGateway,
                                                 FlowObject cluster2Child,
                                                 java.util.ArrayList<FlowObject> cluster1Children,
                                                 java.util.ArrayList<FlowObject> cluster2Parents,
                                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> activityConditions,
                                                 java.util.ArrayList<FlowObject> activitiesAlwaysExecuted)
Creates new Gateways for the overlapping ones. A parallel split is created which is followed by xor split nodes for each activity (cluster 1 children). Cluster 2 is replaced by xor join nodes which connect to an and join.

Parameters:
sourceModel - BPMN model
splitGateway - Overlapping gateway (start of cluster 1)
cluster2LastGateway - end of cluster 2
cluster2Child - first activity after cluster 2
cluster1Children - first activity after cluster 1 (between cluster 1 and 2)
cluster2Parents - last activity before cluster 2 (between cluster 1 and 2)
activityConditions - conditions for each activity
activitiesAlwaysExecuted - list of activities that are always executed, regardless of condition

createNewXorSplit

private static void createNewXorSplit(BpmnModel sourceModel,
                                      Gateway splitGateway,
                                      Gateway newSplit,
                                      Gateway newJoin,
                                      java.lang.String newId,
                                      FlowObject cluster1Child,
                                      FlowObject cluster2Parent,
                                      java.lang.String condition)
Creates a new XOR split node and sets the conditions

Parameters:
sourceModel - BPMN model
splitGateway - overlapping gateway (start of cluster 1)
newSplit - newly created parallel split node
newJoin - newly created parallel join node
newId - ID for new nodes
cluster1Child - child of cluster 1 (activity)
cluster2Parent - parent of cluster 2 (activity)
condition - condition for the new xor split

createNewParallelSplit

private static Gateway createNewParallelSplit(BpmnModel sourceModel,
                                              Gateway splitGateway,
                                              Gateway cluster2LastGateway,
                                              FlowObject cluster2Child,
                                              Gateway newSplit)
Creates a new parallel split node for a resolved gateway

Parameters:
sourceModel - BPMN model
splitGateway - overlapping gateway (star of cluster 1)
cluster2LastGateway - end of cluster 2
cluster2Child - first activity after cluster 2
newSplit - new split node
Returns:
new join node

removeOverlappingGateways

private static void removeOverlappingGateways(BpmnModel sourceModel,
                                              java.util.ArrayList<SequenceFlow[]> cluster1PathList,
                                              java.util.ArrayList<SequenceFlow[]> cluster2PathList)
Removes resolved overlapping gateways

Parameters:
sourceModel - BPMN model
cluster1PathList - list of paths in cluster 1
cluster2PathList - list of paths in cluster 2

getAlwaysExecutedActivities

private static java.util.ArrayList<FlowObject> getAlwaysExecutedActivities(java.util.ArrayList<SequenceFlow[]> cluster1PathList,
                                                                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cluster1PathConditions,
                                                                           java.util.ArrayList<FlowObject> cluster1Children)
Are some activities executed for all conditions?

Parameters:
cluster1PathList - list of paths in cluster 1
cluster1PathConditions - list of conditions for each path in cluster 1
cluster1Children - children (activities) of cluster 1
Returns:
list of flow objects that are executed regardless of conditions (always true)

getConditionsForAllActivities

private static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getConditionsForAllActivities(java.util.ArrayList<SequenceFlow[]> cluster1PathList,
                                                                                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cluster1PathConditions,
                                                                                   java.util.ArrayList<FlowObject> cluster1Children)
returns a list of conditions, one for each activity

Parameters:
cluster1PathList - list of paths in cluster 1
cluster1PathConditions - list of conditions for each path in cluster 1
cluster1Children - child nodes (activities) of cluster 1
Returns:
list of conditions for each activity

getCluster1ChildrenCluster2Parents

private static void getCluster1ChildrenCluster2Parents(java.util.ArrayList<SequenceFlow[]> cluster1PathList,
                                                       java.util.ArrayList<FlowObject> cluster2ParentNode,
                                                       java.util.ArrayList<FlowObject> cluster1Children,
                                                       java.util.ArrayList<FlowObject> cluster2Parents)
Get all child objects of cluster 1 and all parent objects of cluster two. All these objects are activities between the two clusters.

Parameters:
cluster1PathList - list of all paths in cluster 1
cluster2ParentNode - list of parent nodes for cluster 2
cluster1Children - list of child nodes for cluster 1
cluster2Parents - list of parent nodes for cluster 2

getCluster1PathConditions

private static void getCluster1PathConditions(BpmnModel sourceModel,
                                              java.util.ArrayList<SequenceFlow[]> cluster1PathList,
                                              java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> cluster1PathConditions)
Get conditions for all paths in cluster 1

Parameters:
sourceModel - BPMN model
cluster1PathList - list of paths in cluster 1
cluster1PathConditions - list of conditions for each path in cluster 1

checkCluster2PathsEndObject

private static SequenceFlow checkCluster2PathsEndObject(java.util.ArrayList<SequenceFlow[]> cluster2PathList)
Check if all cluster 2 paths end in the same object. In this case, the last sequence flow of cluster 2 is returned. If this is not the case, return null.

Parameters:
cluster2PathList - list of paths in cluster 2
Returns:
last sequence flow of cluster 2 or null if cluster 2 end undefined

getCluster2

private static boolean getCluster2(BpmnModel sourceModel,
                                   java.util.ArrayList<SequenceFlow[]> cluster1PathList,
                                   java.util.ArrayList<FlowObject> cluster2ParentNode,
                                   java.util.ArrayList<SequenceFlow[]> cluster2PathList)
Find join gateway(s) with equal types for a given list of paths that consist of Gateways. Get parent nodes for each possible path (join).

Parameters:
sourceModel - BPMN model
cluster1PathList - list of paths with gateways - search matching gateways for these paths
cluster2ParentNode - parent nodes for all paths in second cluster
cluster2PathList - list of paths with gateways from second cluster

matchGatewayJoin

private static SequenceFlow[] matchGatewayJoin(BpmnModel sourceModel,
                                               SequenceFlow[] cluster1Path,
                                               java.util.ArrayList<SequenceFlow[]> cluster2PathList)
Compares (matches) the given gateway and its children with the given path. Used to check if the given Gateway (and children) can be consolidated to a Join.

Parameters:
sourceModel - BPMN model
cluster1Path - path in cluster 1 where matching path is searched
cluster2PathList - list of all paths in cluster 2
Returns:
path in cluster 2 if path matches, otherwise null
